verses.kjv: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
verses.ct: The heavens proclaim the glory of God, and the expanse above displays his handiwork.

verses.kjv: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.
verses.ct: Each day pours out its message to the next, and every night reveals knowledge to the one that follows.

verses.kjv: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
verses.ct: There is no language or dialect where their voice cannot be heard.

verses.kjv: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,
verses.ct: Their influence reaches across the whole earth, and their words extend to the farthest corners of the world. God has placed a tent in them for the sun,

verses.kjv: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.
verses.ct: which emerges like a groom stepping out of his wedding chamber, and celebrates like an athlete eager to run his course.

verses.kjv: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.
verses.ct: It rises at one end of the heavens and travels in an arc to the other end, and nothing escapes its heat.

verses.kjv: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
verses.ct: The law of the LORD is flawless, restoring the soul. The testimony of the LORD is trustworthy, giving wisdom to the inexperienced.

verses.kjv: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
verses.ct: The instructions of the LORD are just, filling the heart with joy. The commands of the LORD are pure, giving light to the eyes.

verses.kjv: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
verses.ct: Wholehearted dedication to the LORD is clean, lasting forever. The decisions of the LORD are true, and every one of them is righteous.

verses.kjv: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
verses.ct: They are more desirable than gold â€” yes, more than an abundance of the finest gold. They are sweeter than honey, even honey fresh from the comb.

verses.kjv: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.
verses.ct: Through them your servant receives warning, and in following them there is great reward.

verses.kjv: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.
verses.ct: Who can recognize all their own mistakes? Forgive me for the faults I cannot even see.

verses.kjv: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.
verses.ct: Also keep your servant from deliberate sins; don't let them control me. Then I will be blameless, and I will be free from serious transgression.

verses.kjv: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
verses.ct: May the words I speak and the thoughts I hold in my heart be pleasing in your sight, LORD, my rock and my redeemer.
